basics.name: Xi Wang
basics.label: Researcher
basics.summary: A computer science researcher focused on the domains of conversational AI, information retrieval, recommender systems and natural language processing.

work.name: Web Intelligence Group, School of Computer Science, University College London
work.summary: Research on task-oriented dialogue systems, information retrieval and natural language processing.

courses: Users' Adoption of Information in Recommender Systems

awards.title: Nobel Prize in Physics
awards.summary: The Nobel Prizes are five separate prizes that, according to Alfred Nobel's will of 1895, are awarded to 'those who, during the preceding year, have conferred the greatest benefit to humankind.'
